tweet.text: This #FavoriteFRUS further specifies Soviet reaction to U.S. Embassy Moscow’s 1978 discovery of listening devices in a tunnel connecting to an adjoining property. 🕵️‍♀️ Read about the actions taken by the Soviets to thwart Embassy work on the tunnel: https://t.co/mFY3QaDdhk https://t.co/ZZSYn0Fd54
